featured.text: The fashion soon spread beyond the circle of the nobility to the middle classes, and tea became a popular drink at the London coffee houses where people met to do business and discuss events of the day.
Boys tend to pay less attention in class than girls.
All the new students were given one minute to _____ introduce themselves to the whole class.
The goal of MOOCs. (C) The size of MOOC classes.

other.text: Mr. Smith won't tolerate talking during class; he says it others.
Conversely, boys who appear to be inattentive in class may just be sitting too far away to hear the teacher.
If I had known the fact, (C) … or she might miss the class.
Peter stayed up late last night, so he drank a lot of coffee this morning to keep himself _____ in class.
Jane felt ______ speaking in front of the class but was quite relaxed talking with her good friends.
Kevin burst into tears _____ because his teacher punished him in front of the whole class.

At the end of the class, you __(25)__ with you classmates the meals you have created, and you will leave with recipe handouts and , more importantly, the ability to cook two weeks of fantastic, low-cost meals.
After hours of discussion, our class finally reached the _____ that we would go to Hualien for our graduation trip.
John's poor math score must have him a lot, because he is not attending the class any more.
The students in Professor Smith’s classical Chinese class are required to _____
To encourage classroom _____, the teacher divided the class into groups and asked them to solve a problem together with their partners.
In working-class households, it was served with the main meal of the day, eaten when workers returned home after a day’s labor.

definition.zh_def: 一組具有相同特徵或屬性的事物，通常用於編程或教育中的分類。
definition.en_def: A group of individuals or items that share common characteristics, often used in programming or education for categorization.
definition.example: She is taking a class on computer programming this semester.
